inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of ANCA associated vasculitis according to the Chapel-Hill Consensus Conference - 2012 modified version
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Wegener's granulomatosis was diagnosed for him

inclusion.criterion: willing to participate and to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient concerned by articles L 1121-5 to L 1121-8 (persons deprived of their liberty by a judicial or administrative decision, minors, persons of legal age who are the object of a legal protection measure or unable to express their consent)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 57-year-old man with Wegener's granulomatosis, treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago.
